meanings.definition: A person who tends a bar.
meanings.sent1: The friendly barkeeps at the pub always remember my favorite drink.
meanings.sent2: The barkeeps work hard to keep the customers happy and the drinks flowing.
meanings.sent3: The barkeeps had a contest to see who could mix the craziest cocktail.
meanings.sent4: The barkeeps are the conductors of the lively symphony of the bar.
meanings.sent5: The barkeeps are the heart and soul of the neighborhood watering hole.

meanings.sent1: She barkeeps at the local tavern on weekends to earn extra money.
meanings.sent2: He barkeeps with a smile, chatting with patrons as he pours drinks.
meanings.sent3: The robot barkeeps malfunctioned and started serving drinks upside down.
meanings.sent4: The moon barkeeps, pouring out its silvery light over the sleeping town.
meanings.sent5: The wind barkeeps through the trees, rustling the leaves in a gentle dance.
